alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Caldwell; Comal; Hays; Lee; Travis; Williamson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 11:59AM CST until January 17 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TUESDAY TO 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as zero. * WHERE...Portions of south central Texas. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST today. For the Wind Chill Warning, until 9 AM CST Tuesday. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 9 AM Tuesday to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While wintry precipitation has come to an end, residual icy spots could remain on some area roadways.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Bastrop; Caldwell; Comal; Hays; Lee; Travis; Williamson
